      case "ArrowDown":

        break;
      case "ArrowUp":
        e.preventDefault();
        this.setState({ highlighted: cycle(filteredItems.reverse(), highlighted) });
        break;

        e.preventDefault();
        highlighted && this.select(highlighted);
